All Classes

Class
Description
Admin
This class is the Admin class ,it extends the user class , the admin can addionally edit , access and delete profiles of other users.
AdminDAOImp
This class Implements the Methods of the Interface UserDAO for the Admin
AdminPage
this class displays to the admin a list of all doctors and patients profiles furthermore it enables him to edit or delete them
Appointment
This class is used to set up appointments between patients and doctors using their IDs and other information
AppointmentDAO
This class has all the Methods that can be used to access the Database table of Appointment They are implemented in the class AppointmentDAOImp
AppointmentDAOImp
This class is used to connect to the database and access and edit appointments
CancelAppointment
This class represents the page where a patient can cancel an appointment in the GUI
DBConnection
this class enable to connect our java application with the database using JDBC.
DistanceOfSearch
this class is a utility class and contains the static method calculating the distance of search
Doctor
This class is the Patient class ,it extends the user class , The Patient is the main user of the application and recieves alot of functionality.
DoctorDAOImp
This class Implements the Methods of the Interface UserDAO for the Doctor
DoctorHomePage
This class is the Homepage of the doctor.
EmailException
this class extends from Exception, and it would be thrown when a checked error occurs in commons-email-format.
EmailVerification
this class verify if the given email fulfill the required conditions.
EnumMapping
Utility class to map the health problems to their correspondent doctor specialization
ExportHealthInfo
this class represents the page in the GUI where a patient can export their health info
GeneratePassword
This class generates a random password from given requirements.
HealthProblem
This is a list of health problems that are shown in the selection.
InsuranceType
This enum contains the Type of Insurance
Login
this class displays to the user "Patient/Doctor/Admin" the Login page to access to the app
Mailer
a utility class to send an email using the SMTP protocol and the Google Gmail services
Main
Our Application starts with this class.
MakeAppointment
This class represents the page where a patient can make an appointment in the GUI
MapUtils
A utility class to get the coordinates of an address using the open website OpenStreetMap
PasswordException
this class extends from Exception, and it would be thrown when a checked error occurs in Password forms.
PasswordManager
this class is used to manage passwords in the app, through verifying,encryption and decryption
Patient
This class is the Patient class ,it extends the user class , The Patient is the main user of the application and recieves alot of functionality.
PatientDAOImp
This class implements the methods of the Patient class
PatientHomePage
This class represents the homepage of the patient in the GUI, in other words the page where a patient lands after being successfully logged in
RegisterDoc
this class displays to the doctor the registration Page
RegisterPatient
this class displays to the patient the registration Page
Reminder
Thi class represents the reminder functionality.
ResetPasswordPage
This class created the Page that the User sees when resetting his password
Schedule
This class sets up the schedule for doctors using IDs for doctors and schedules, imported attributes for date and time and a status for booked appointments.
ScheduleDAO
This class has all the Methods that can be used to access the Database table of Schedule They are implemented in the class ScheduleDAOImp
ScheduleDAOImp
This class is used to connect to the database and access and edit schedules
ScheduleException
this class extends from Exception, and it would be thrown when an already exists schedule would be taken.
setNewPassword
This class creates the Page that the User sees after requesting a new Password.
ShiftAppointment
This class represents the page where a patient can shift an appointment in the GUI
Specialization
This enum contains every Specialization a doctor can have
Status
This is an enum that indicates the Status of the slot
User
This class is an abstract user class ,its properties are inherited into the child classes, The user is either a patient , admin or doctor
UserDAO<User>
This interface specifies the abstract methods that the DAO Implementations of the Subclasses of User must implement
